row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 7)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 8)
row_desc: Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least one lip sync win.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
